name: sessionsbot
description: SessionsBot makes it simple to schedule and manage recurring events directly in your Discord server. With our web dashboard, you can create sessions that automatically appear in your server as interactive session panels. Learn more at https://docs.sessionsbot.fyi.

scripts.db:gen-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id nrhesahngnvomojthnta > packages/shared/types/database/supabase.ts
